en-US.summary: Listen to Pepper Radio, less bla bla bla, more la la la.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Pepper Radio to play
en-US.name: Pepper Radio
en-US.description:
Listen to Pepper Radio, with less bla bla bla, and more la la la.

pepper radio provides a high quality sound 24/7 with the best music.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch pepper radio" or "Alexa, play pepper radio" to start the radio".

At anytime, you can stop the radio by saying "Alexa, stop"
